articles.title: Phillies shopping for rotation depth in trade market as they bet on their top 4 starters - The Athletic
articles.description: The Phillies say Andrew Painter is unlikely to pitch in the majors in 2023. They are telling teams they would like to add a "depth" starter.
articles.content:
PHILADELPHIA For four days, Aaron Nola did not throw a baseball. He took a trip to Key Largo, Fla., with his wife during the All-Star break. They ate good food. They relaxed.

articles.title: Giants' double duty: Two Flores HRs, two Doval saves, 2 wins - San Francisco Chronicle
articles.description: The San Francisco Giants picked up a pair of wins in Cincinnati on Tuesday, the first in a completed game from Monday and the second an 11-10 slugfest.
